description.value:
Fear

Aura 5

Any enemy within the aura grants combat advantage to Zebukiel.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+36 vs AC; 2d10+11 damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage and is immobilized (save ends both).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+36 vs AC; 1d10+11 damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Zebukiel moves up to 10 squares and makes a claw attack against one target and a tail lash attack against another target at any points during its move.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy misses zebukial with a melee attack, at-will

Zebukiel makes a tail lash attack against the triggering enemy.

Encounter ✦ Psychic

Free

Close burst 10

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Targets immobilized or petrified enemies; 4d10 + 10 psychic damage

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 5

+34 vs Fortitude; 3d10+9 acid damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares, and the target takes ongoing 10 acid damage and is immobilized (save ends both).

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +34 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Zebukiel's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Area burst 5 within 20, centered on the triggering creature

Trigger: When a creature within 20 squares fails a saving throw against being petrified, at-will

+34 vs Fortitude; the target is petrified (save ends). Zebukiel is immune to this attack, and using this power does not provoke opportunity attacks. Aftereffect: The target is immobilized (save ends). A creature that fails a saving throw against this immobilized condition becomes petrified again as if hit by the infectious petrification power, including this aftereffect.

Recharge 6

Close burst 5

Targets immobilized enemies; +34 vs Fortitude; the target is petrified (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is immobilized (save ends). A creature that fails a saving throw against this immobilized condition becomes petrified again as if hit by the stone's embrace power, including this aftereffect.
Zebukiel deals 1d10 extra damage against any target he has combat advantage against.
Zebukiel rolls twice for initiative and takes the better result.

Alignment Chaotic evil

Passive Perception 25 | Insight 25
